description:
The test case RequestExtensionTest in nova/api/openstack/test_extensions fails when run with the command:

./run_tests.sh api.openstack.test_extensions:RequestExtensionTest

This is because it depends on a FLAG set in a previously run test case.
title: RequestExtensionTest fails to run on its own

comments.content:
The test case RequestExtensionTest in nova/api/openstack/test_extensions fails when run with the command:

./run_tests.sh api.openstack.test_extensions:RequestExtensionTest

This is because it depends on a FLAG set in a previously run test case.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alex-meade

comments.content: NOTE: bug 817536 allows this to happen
